short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to facilitate startup ideas using chatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing One Person Startup GPT, a transformative browser extension designed to supercharge your solo entrepreneurial journey. Brought to you by the creators of CustomGPT and built for the OpenAI ChatGPT platform (https://chat.openai.com/), One Person Startup GPT delivers the team you need, when you need it.

Being a solo founder is no easy task, juggling roles from backend development to marketing. But with One Person Startup GPT, you can bring your virtual team to life. This extension allows you to inject specific startup roles into your prompts, guiding ChatGPT's responses to simulate the advice and insights you'd get from a specialist in that role.

In need of a backend developer's perspective? Or perhaps the strategic thinking of a seasoned marketer? One Person Startup GPT equips you with an array of startup roles at your fingertips.

Key Features:

Startup Roles on Demand: Choose from a range of predefined startup roles or define your own to influence AI responses.
Seamless Integration: Effortlessly merges with the ChatGPT interface upon installation.
Data Privacy: Your privacy matters to us. We do not collect or store your data.
